DOC.brief_title: Photodynamic Therapy ( PDT ) Effect Large Surface Photodamaged Skin
DOC.detailed_description: Study design : Patients method : 26 patient ( 16 female , 8 male ) age 35-90 year , mean 59,4 Skin type I-IV , severely photodamaged facial skin Multiples Aks face ( total 268 ) minimum 3 per patient Approved local ethical committee inform consent give Treatment procedure : Prior curettage Full-face MAL application ( Metvix ® , Galderma France ) 1,5 tube per treatment Incubation time 3 h - first treatment session ; 1,5 h - 2 nd 3 rd session Illumination LED ( Aktilite® Photocure , Norway ) 635 nm 37 J/cm2 3 treatment perform , one month apart Pain monitoring : force air cool device Evaluation : Clinical - 5 point scale base Dover 's Zane 's study Dover JS et al . Topical ALA combine IPL photoaging . Arch Dermatol 2005 ; 141 : 1247-52 Zane et al . Clinical echographical analysis MAL- PDT photodamaged skin . Laser Surg Med 2007 ; 39 : 203-9 Histological - Hematoxilin- Eosin stain Immunohistochemical study- HP 53 , Metalloproteinases , Procollagen I ,
DOC.criteria: Patients severe photodamage least 3 actinic keratosis face Pregnancy , laser , chemical peel , imiquimod 5Fu treatment last year
